sentences.sContent: Thieves broke into the offices and stole $150,000’s worth of computer equipment.
sentences.sCn: 小偷破门进入办公室，偷走了价值15万美元的电脑设备。

sentences.sContent: They were nothing but petty thieves (= thieves who steal small things ) .

trans.tranOther: someone who steals things from another person or place
